thread.title: Gigi Hadid rocks quirky spectacles during LFW | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Gigi Hadid rocks quirky spectacles during LFW | Daily Mail Online

author: Rebecca Lawrence For Mailonline
title: Gigi Hadid rocks quirky spectacles during LFW | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 231 shares She teamed the garment with a white crop top which revealed a hint of her toned abs whilst remaining demure. Layering up, the Vogue covergirl donned a fluffy cream cardigan, whilst her golden locks were swept away from her face. Model moment: Looking effortlessly chic on the outing, the model of the moment, 21, oozed glamour in her muted ensemble which showed off her incredible frame Gigi has been in London promoting her new line with Tommy Hilfiger, but fans were left disappointed when they queued for hours to meet her but she failed to greet them all. The elder sister of Bella Hadid dropped in on their flagship store on Brompton Road for a meet-and-greet on Sunday. But some of Gigi's avid followers were left disappointed after she allegedly stayed for just half an hour and only met people wearing wristbands - with one claiming she got 'elbowed in the face'. Leggy lady! Elongating her model pins, the blonde bombshell donned a pair of high-waisted nude trousers that flattered her shape Ab fab! Gigi teamed her stunning trousers with a white crop top which revealed a hint of her toned abs whilst remaining demure LydiePidie wrote on Instagram: 'Would have been great if people who queued hours got to meet her. 'Bit disappointing she only stayed for less than 1/2 hr and only met wristband people.' Chatting to another fan on the site, she added: 'Did you see when Gigi went upstairs and then the woman who works there let in people from outside without wristbands?' Another fan lamented: 'The amount of people that pushed was unbelievable, I got elbowed in the face and some girl was literally on my back.' That's a wrap: Layering up, the Vogue covergirl donned a fluffy cream cardigan, whilst her golden locks were swept away from her face Share or comment on this article 231
